item.title: Introducing Claude 3 Family: Anthropic's Most Capable AI Models
item.description: <![CDATA[Anthropic introduces the Claude 3 family Haiku, Sonnet, and Opus - our most capable AI models yet. With substantially improved performance across language understanding, math, coding, and vision, the Claude 3 family sets new standards in capability and safety.]]>

item.title: Introducing Claude 3 Family: Anthropic's Most Capable AI Models

item.title: Refining Social Media Share Buttons - Grayscale UI Update
item.description: <![CDATA[In this session, we update social media share buttons to follow a clean grayscale aesthetic. The changes include setting button backgrounds to light gray, darkening icons for better contrast, ensuring a uniform monochrome look, and maintaining hover animations while removing color-specific styles. The result is a polished and professional UI that enhances site consistency.]]>

item.title: Build AI Web App w/ React & OpenAI ChatGPT 4 Vision - QR Code Bot
item.description: <![CDATA[Build a web application that uses OpenAI's ChatGPT 4 Vision API to analyze QR codes. Learn how to integrate AI vision capabilities into your React applications.]]>

item.title: How to Create Custom ChatGPT & Claude Like AI Model
item.description: <![CDATA[Learn how to create your own custom AI model similar to ChatGPT and Claude. This tutorial walks through the process of fine-tuning and customizing large language models for specific use cases.]]>
